Echoes of the Opera
Marsden, West Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £15, 3rd £10, 4th £5. March contest (British Legion) - 1st Holme, 2nd Hepworth, 3rd Sowerby Bridge. 6 bands competed.
Nov. 6, 2013, 10:56 a.m. Nov. 8, 2018, 12:22 p.m.
